q_en: What is the material with the highest remaining inventory?

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id ORDER BY wm.left_number DESC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID and name with the highest remaining inventory

response:
Sure thing! Based on the latest data, the material with the highest remaining inventory is:

| Material ID | Material Name  |
|-------------|----------------|
| 6           | Silk Pieces    |
